# Metalminer

## Install

<pre>
  git clone git://github/sjaak666/metalminer.git
  cd metalminer
  npm link
</pre>

## Usage

```javascript
var mm = require('metalminer');
metalminer.getLyrics(obj, function (err, data) {
    if (!err) {
        console.log(data);
    } else {
        console.log('Lyrics not found: ' + err);
    }
});
```
obj should be an object:
```
{
    artist: 'artistname',
    album:  'albumname',
    title:  'songtitle'
}
```
